# Explorartoy Analysis

## Normalization of Numeric Values

```{r}
#install.packages("dplyr")
library(dplyr)

fraudTotal.db_norm <- fraudTotal.db %>% mutate_each_(list(~scale(.) %>% as.vector), vars = c("cc_num", "amt", "zip", "lat", "long", "city_pop", "unix_time", "merch_lat", "merch_long"))

head(fraudTotal.db_norm)

```
